dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2815 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 30 East Somerset Street in Raritan, New Jersey, as the “Sergeant John Basilone Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lance (for himself, Mr. LoBiondo, Mr. Pascrell, Mr. MacArthur, Mrs. Watson Coleman, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, Mr. Norcross, Mr. Frelinghuysen, Mr. Payne, Mr. Sires, Mr. Pallone, and Mr. Gottheimer) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 30 East Somerset Street in Raritan, New Jersey, as the Sergeant John Basilone Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 30 East Somerset Street in Raritan, New Jersey, shall be known and designated as the Sergeant John Basilone Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Sergeant John Basilone Post Office.
